name: GB/T 45288.2-2025 Intelligent Connected Vehicle â€” Vehicle Intelligent Agent Assessment Part 2: Performance Requirements
provider: State Administration for Market Regulation / Standardization Administration of China
use_case: National recommended standard specifying performance indicators and testing methods for vehicle intelligent agents.
data_summary: Requires collection of scenario, perception, and interaction data to validate vehicle intelligent agent performance.
compliance_materials: Quality management records for intelligent agent development
monitoring: Encourages periodic conformity testing and updates aligned with new operational scenarios.
emergency_plan: Advises maintaining corrective action plans when performance requirements are not met.
obligations: Execute standardized performance tests covering perception, decision, and control.
Document measurement results and uncertainty for key indicators.
Maintain traceability between requirements, test cases, and results.
